features.description: When the Shark makes a successful attack, the target must mark an Armor Slot without receiving its benefits (they can still use armor to reduce the damage). If they can't mark an Armor Slot, they must mark an additional HP.

features.name: Blood in the Water
features.description: When a creature within Close range of the Shark marks HP from another creature's attack, you can mark a Stress to immediately spotlight the Shark, moving them into Melee range of the target and making a standard attack.

siren.name: Siren
siren.appearance: *A half fish person with shimmering scales and an irresistible voice.*

features.name: Captive Audience
features.description: If the Siren makes a standard attack against a target Entranced by their song, the attack deals 2d10+1 damage instead of their standard damage.

features.name: Enchanting Song
features.description: Spend a Fear to sing a song that affects all targets within Close range. Targets must succeed on an Instinct Reaction Roll or become Entranced until they mark 2 Stress. Other Sirens within Close range of the target can mark a Stress to each add a +1 bonus to the Difficulty of the reaction roll. While Entranced, a target can't act and is Vulnerable.

skeleton archer.name: Skeleton Archer
skeleton archer.appearance: *A fragile skeleton with a shortbow and arrows.*

features.name: Opportunist
features.description: When two or more adversaries are within Very Close range of a creature, all damage they each deal to that creature is doubled.

features.name: Deadly Shot
features.description: Make an attack against a Vulnerable target within Far range. On a success, mark a Stress to deal 3d4+8 physical damage.

features.name: Minion (4)
features.description: The Dredge is defeated when they take any damage. For every 4 damage a PC deals to the Dredge, defeat an additional Minion within range the attack would succeed against.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Spend a Fear to choose a target and spotlight all Dredges within Close range of them. Those Minions move into Melee range of the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 1 physical damage each. Combine this damage.

skeleton knight.name: Skeleton Knight
skeleton knight.appearance: *A large armored skeleton with a huge blade.*

features.name: Terrifying
features.description: When the Knight makes a successful attack, all PCs within Close range lose a Hope and you gain a Fear.

features.name: Cut to the Bone
features.description: Mark a Stress to make an attack against all targets within Very Close range. Targets the Knight succeeds against take 1d8+2 physical damage and must mark a Stress.

features.name: Dig Two Graves
features.description: When the Knight is defeated, they make an attack against a target within Very Close range (prioritizing the creature who killed them). On a success, the target takes 1d8+4 physical damage and loses 1d4 Hope.

skeleton warrior.name: Skeleton Warrior
skeleton warrior.appearance: *A dirt-covered skeleton armed with a rusted blade.*

features.name: Only Bones
features.description: The Warrior is resistant to physical damage.

features.name: Reform
features.description: When the Warrior is defeated, roll a d6. On a result of 6, if there are other adversaries on the battlefield, the Warrior re-forms with no marked HP.

spectral archer.name: Spectral Archer
spectral archer.appearance: *A ghostly fighter with an ethereal bow, unable to move on while their charge is vulnerable.*

features.name: Ghost
features.description: The Archer has resistance to physical damage. Mark a Stress to move up to Close range through solid objects.

features.name: Pick Your Target
features.description: Spend a Fear to make an attack against a target within Very Close range of at least two other PCs. On a success, the target takes 2d8+12 physical damage.

spectral captain.name: Spectral Captain
spectral captain.appearance: *A ghostly commander leading their troops beyond death.*

features.name: Ghost
features.description: The Captain has resistance to physical damage. Mark a Stress to move up to Close range through solid objects.

features.name: Unending Battle
features.description: Spend 2 Fear to return up to 1d4+1 defeated Spectral allies to the battle at the points where they first appeared (with no marked HP or Stress).

features.name: Hold Fast
features.description: When the Captain's Spectral allies are forced to make a reaction roll, you can mark a Stress to give those allies a +2 bonus to the roll.

features.name: Momentum
features.description: When the Captain makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

spectral guardian.name: Spectral Guardian
spectral guardian.appearance: *A ghostly fighter with spears and swords, anchored by duty.*

features.name: Ghost
features.description: The Guardian has resistance to physical damage. Mark a Stress to move up to Close range through solid objects.

features.name: Grave Blade
features.description: Spend a Fear to make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, deal 2d10+6 physical damage and the target must mark a Stress.

spellblade.name: Spellblade
spellblade.appearance: *A mercenary combining swordplay and magic to deadly effect.*

features.name: Arcane Steel
features.description: Damage dealt by the Spellblade's standard attack is considered both physical and magic.

features.name: Suppressing Blast
features.description: Mark a Stress and target a group within Far range. All targets must succeed on an Agility Reaction Roll or take 1d8+2 magic damage. You gain a Fear for each target who marked HP from this attack.

features.name: Move as Unit
features.description: Spend 2 Fear to spotlight up to five allies within Far range.

features.name: Momentum
features.description: When the Spellblade makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

spy.name: Spy
spy.appearance: *A skilled espionage agent with a knack for being in the right place to overhear secrets.*

features.name: Gathering Secrets
features.description: Spend a Fear to describe how the Spy knows a secret about a PC in the scene.

features.name: Fly on the Wall
features.description: When a PC or group is discussing something sensitive, you can mark a Stress to reveal that the Spy is present in the scene, observing them. If the Spy escapes the scene to report their findings, you gain 1d4 Fear.

stag knight.name: Stag Knight
stag knight.appearance: *A knight with huge, majestic antlers wearing armor made of dangerous thorns.*

features.name: From Above
features.description: When the Knight succeeds on a standard attack from above a target, they deal 3d12+3 physical damage instead of their standard damage.

features.name: Blade of the Forest
features.description: Spend a Fear to make an attack against all targets within Very Close range. Targets the Knight succeeds against take physical damage equal to 3d4 + the target's Major threshold.

features.name: Thorny Armor
features.description: When the Knight takes damage from an attack within Melee range, you can mark a Stress to deal 1d10+5 physical damage to the attacker.

stonewraith.name: Stonewraith
stonewraith.appearance: *A prowling hunter, like a slinking mountain lion, with a slate-gray stone body.*

features.name: Stonestrider
features.description: The Stonewraith can move through stone and earth as easily as air. While within stone or earth, they are Hidden and immune to all damage.

features.name: Rocky Ambush
features.description: While Hidden, mark a Stress to leap into Melee range with a target within Very Close range. The target must succeed on an Agility or Instinct Reaction Roll (15) or take 2d8 physical damage and become temporarily Restrained.

features.name: Avalanche Roar
features.description: Spend a Fear to roar while within a cave and cause a cave-in. All targets within Close range must succeed on an Agility Reaction Roll (14) or take 2d10 physical damage. The rubble can be cleared with a Progress Countdown (8).

features.name: Momentum
features.description: When the Stonewraith makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

swarm of rats.name: Swarm of Rats
swarm of rats.appearance: *A skittering mass of ordinary rodents moving as one like a ravenous wave.*

features.name: Horde (1d4+1)
features.description: When the Swarm has marked half or more of their HP, their standard attack deals 1d4+1 physical damage instead.

features.name: In Your Face
features.description: All targets within Melee range have disadvantage on attacks against targets other than the Swarm.

sylvan soldier.name: Sylvan Soldier
sylvan soldier.appearance: *A faerie warrior adorned in armor made of leaves and bark.*

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: If the Soldier makes a standard attack and another Sylvan Soldier is within Melee range of the target, deal 1d8+5 physical damage instead of their standard damage.

features.name: Forest Control
features.description: Spend a Fear to pull down a tree within Close range. A creature hit by the tree must succeed on an Agility Reaction Roll (15) or take 1d10 physical damage.

features.name: Blend In
features.description: When the Soldier makes a successful attack, you can mark a Stress to become Hidden until the Soldier's next attack or a PC succeeds on an Instinct Roll (14) to find them.

tangle bramble swarm.name: Tangle Bramble Swarm
tangle bramble swarm.appearance: *A cluster of animated, blood-drinking tumbleweeds, each the size of a large gourd.*

features.name: Horde (1d4+2)
features.description: When the Swarm has marked half or more of their HP, their standard attack deals 1d4+2 physical damage instead.

features.name: Crush
features.description: Mark a Stress to deal 2d6+8 direct physical damage to a target with 3 or more bramble tokens.

features.name: Encumber
features.description: When the Swarm succeeds on an attack, give the target a bramble token. If a target has any bramble tokens, they are Restrained. If a target has 3 or more bramble tokens, they are also Vulnerable. All bramble tokens can be removed by succeeding on a Finesse Roll (12 + the number of bramble tokens) or dealing Major or greater damage to the Swarm. If bramble tokens are removed from a target using a Finesse Roll, a number of Tangle Bramble Minions spawn within Melee range equal to the number of tokens removed.

features.name: Minion (4)
features.description: The Bramble is defeated when they take any damage. For every 4 damage a PC deals to the Tangle Bramble, defeat an additional Minion within range the attack would succeed against.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Spend a Fear to choose a target and spotlight all Tangle Brambles within Close range of them. Those Minions move into Melee range of the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 2 physical damage each. Combine this damage.

features.name: Drain and Multiply
features.description: When an attack from the Bramble causes a target to mark HP and there are three or more Tangle Bramble Minions within Close range, you can combine the Minions into a Tangle Bramble Swarm Horde. The Horde's HP is equal to the number of Minions combined.

tiny green ooze.name: Tiny Green Ooze
tiny green ooze.appearance: *A small moving mound of translucent green slime.*

features.name: Acidic Form
features.description: When the Ooze makes a successful attack, the target must mark an Armor Slot without receiving its benefits (they can still use armor to reduce the damage). If they can't mark an Armor Slot, they must mark an additional HP.

tiny red ooze.name: Tiny Red Ooze
tiny red ooze.appearance: *A small moving mound of translucent flaming red slime.*

features.name: Burning
features.description: When a creature within Melee range deals damage to the Ooze, they take 1d6 direct magic damage.

features.name: Minion (6)
features.description: The Sapling is defeated when they take any damage. For every 6 damage a PC deals to the Sapling, defeat an additional Minion within range the attack would succeed against.

features.name: Group Attack
features.description: Spend a Fear to choose a target and spotlight all Treant Saplings within Close range of them. Those Minions move into Melee range of the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 8 physical damage each. Combine this damage.

vampire.name: Vampire
vampire.appearance: *An intelligent undead with blood-stained lips and a predator's smile.*

features.name: Draining Bite
features.description: Make an attack against a target within Melee range. On a success, deal 4d physical damage. A target who marks HP from this attack loses a Hope and must mark a Stress. The Vampire then clears a HP.

features.name: Mistform
features.description: When the Vampire takes physical damage, you can spend a Fear to take half damage.

vault guardian gaoler.name: Vault Guardian Gaoler
vault guardian gaoler.appearance: *A boxy, dust-covered construct with thick metallic swinging doors on their torso.*

features.name: Blocking Shield
features.description: Creatures within Melee range of the Gaoler have disadvantage on attack rolls against them. Creatures trapped inside the Gaoler are immune to this feature.

features.name: Lock Up
features.description: Mark a Stress to make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, the target is Restrained within the Gaoler until freed with a successful Strength Roll (18). While Restrained, the target can only attack the Gaoler.

vault guardian sentinel.name: Vault Guardian Sentinel
vault guardian sentinel.appearance: *A dust-covered golden construct with boxy limbs and a huge mace for a hand.*

features.name: Kinetic Slam
features.description: Targets who take damage from the Sentinel's standard attack are knocked back to Very Close range.

features.name: Box In
features.description: Mark a Stress to choose a target within Very Close range to focus on. That target has disadvantage on attack rolls when they're within Very Close range of the Sentinel. The Sentinel can only focus on one target at a time.

features.name: Mana Bolt
features.description: Spend a Fear to lob explosive magic at a point within Far range. All targets within Very Close range of that point must make an Agility Reaction Roll. Targets who fail take 8d20 magic damage and are knocked back to Close range. Targets who succeed take half damage and aren't knocked back.

features.name: Momentum
features.description: When the Sentinel makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

vault guardian turret.name: Vault Guardian Turret
vault guardian turret.appearance: *A massive hulking turret with reinforced armor and twelve piston-driven mechanical legs.*

features.name: Slow Firing
features.description: When you spotlight the Turret and they don't have a token on their stat block, they can't make a standard attack. Place a token on their stat block and describe what they're preparing to do. When you spotlight the Turret and they have a token on their stat block, clear the token and they can attack.

features.name: Mark Target
features.description: Spend a Fear to Mark a target within Far range until the Turret is destroyed or the Marked target becomes Hidden. While the target is Marked, their Evasion is halved.

features.name: Concentrate Fire
features.description: When another adversary deals damage to a target within Far range of the Turret, you can mark a Stress to add the Turret's standard attack damage to the damage roll.

features.name: Detonation
features.description: When the Turret is destroyed, they explode. All targets within Close range must make an Agility Reaction Roll. Targets who fail take 3d20 physical damage. Targets who succeed take half damage.

volcanic dragon ashen tyrant.name: Volcanic Dragon: Ashen Tyrant
volcanic dragon ashen tyrant.appearance: *A legendary, lava-hardened dragon. No enemy has ever had the insolence to wound the dragon so.*

features.name: Relentless (4)
features.description: The Ashen Tyrant can be spotlighted up to four times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight them.

features.name: Cornered
features.description: Mark a Stress instead of spending a Fear to spotlight the Ashen Tyrant.

features.name: Ashes to Ashes
features.description: When a PC rolls a failure while within Close range of the Ashen Tyrant, they lose a Hope and you gain a Fear. If the PC can't lose a Hope, they must mark a HP.

features.name: Desperate Rampage
features.description: Mark 3 Stress to make an attack against all targets within Close range. Targets the Ashen Tyrant succeeds against take 2d20+2 physical damage, are knocked back to Close range of where they were, and must mark a Stress.

features.name: Ashen Cloud
features.description: Spend a Fear to smash the ground beneath an adversary within Far range. While within the ash cloud, a target has disadvantage on action rolls. The ash cloud clears the next time an adversary is spotlighted.

features.name: Apocalyptic Thrashing
features.description: Countdown (1d12). Spend a Fear to activate it. It ticks down when a PC rolls with Fear. When it reaches 0, the Ashen Tyrant thrashes about, causing environmental damage (such as an earthquake, avalanche, or collapsing walls). All targets within Far range must make a Strength Reaction Roll. Targets who fail take 2d10+10 physical damage and are Restrained by the rubble until they break free with a successful Strength Roll. Targets who succeed take half damage. If the Ashen Tyrant is defeated while this countdown is active, trigger the countdown immediately as the destruction caused by their death throes.

volcanic dragon molten scourge.name: Volcanic Dragon: Molten Scourge
volcanic dragon molten scourge.appearance: *Engaged by their wounds, the dragon bursts into molten lava.*

features.name: Relentless (3)
features.description: Can be spotlighted up to three times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight them.

features.name: Cracked Scales
features.description: When the Molten Scourge takes damage, roll a number of d6s equal to HP marked. For each result of 4 or higher, you gain a Fear.

features.name: Shattering Might
features.description: Mark a Stress to make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, target takes 4d8+14 physical damage, loses a Hope, and is knocked back to Close range. The Scourge clears a Stress.

features.name: Eruption
features.description: Spend a Fear to erupt lava from beneath the Scourge's scales, filling area within Very Close range with lava. All targets must make Agility Reaction Roll or take 4d6+6 physical damage and be knocked back to Close range. The area remains lava (6 HP damage on entry or action).

features.name: Volcanic Breath
features.description: When the Scourge takes Major damage, roll d10. volcanic dragon obsidian predator.name: Volcanic Dragon: Obsidian Predator
volcanic dragon obsidian predator.appearance: *A massive winged creature with obsidian scales and impossibly sharp claws.*

features.name: Relentless (2)
features.description: Can be spotlighted up to two times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight.

features.name: Flying
features.description: While flying, gains +3 Difficulty.

features.name: Obsidian Scales
features.description: Resistant to physical damage.

features.name: Obsidian Tail
features.description: Mark a Stress to make attack against all targets within Close range. Success: 4d6+4 physical damage, knocked to Far range and Vulnerable until next roll with Hope.

features.name: Dive
features.description: If flying, mark a Stress to choose point within Far range, move there, attack all targets within Very Close range; on success, 2d10+6 physical, mark a Stress, lose a Hope.

features.name: Erupting Rage (Phase Change)
features.description: When marks last HP, replace with Molten Scourge and immediately spotlight.

war wizard.name: War Wizard
war wizard.appearance: *A battle-hardened mage trained in destructive magic.*

features.name: Battle Teleport
features.description: Before or after making a standard attack, you can mark a Stress to teleport to a location within Far range.

features.name: Refresh Warding Sphere
features.description: Mark a Stress to refresh the Wizard's Warding Sphere reaction.

features.name: Eruption
features.description: Spend a Fear and choose a point within Far range. A Very Close area around that point erupts into impassable terrain. All targets within that area must make an Agility Reaction Roll (14). Targets who fail take 2d10 physical damage and are thrown out of the area. Targets who succeed take half damage and aren't moved.

features.name: Arcane Artillery
features.description: Spend a Fear to unleash a precise hail of magical blasts. All targets in the scene must make an Agility Reaction Roll. Targets who fail take 2d12 magic damage. Targets who succeed take half damage.

features.name: Warding Sphere
features.description: When the Wizard takes damage from an attack within Close range, deal 2d6 magic damage to the attacker. This reaction can't be used again until the Wizard refreshes it with their Refresh Warding Sphere action.

weaponmaster.name: Weaponmaster
weaponmaster.appearance: *A master-at-arms wielding a sword twice their size.*

features.name: Goading Strike
features.description: Make a standard attack against a target. On a success, mark a Stress to Taunt the target until their next successful attack. The next time the Taunted target attacks, they have disadvantage against targets other than the Weaponmaster.

features.name: Adrenaline Burst
features.description: Once per scene, spend a Fear to clear 2 HP and 2 Stress.

features.name: Momentum
features.description: When the Weaponmaster makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

young dryad.name: Young Dryad
young dryad.appearance: *An imperious tree-person leading their forest's defenses.*

features.name: Voice of the Forest
features.description: Mark a Stress to spotlight 1d4 allies within range of a target they can attack without moving. On a success, their attacks deal half damage.

features.name: Thorny Cage
features.description: Spend a Fear to form a cage around a target within Very Close range and Restrain them until they're freed with a successful Strength Roll. When a creature makes an action roll against the cage, they must mark a Stress.

features.name: Momentum
features.description: When the Dryad makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

young ice dragon.name: Young Ice Dragon
young ice dragon.appearance: *A glacier-blue dragon with four powerful limbs and frost-tinged wings.*

features.name: Relentless (3)
features.description: The Dragon can be spotlighted up to three times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight them.

features.name: Rend and Crush
features.description: If a target damaged by the Dragon doesn't mark an Armor Slot to reduce the damage, they must mark a Stress.

features.name: No Hope
features.description: When a PC rolls with Fear while within Far range of the Dragon, they lose a Hope.

features.name: Blizzard Breath
features.description: Spend 2 Fear to release an icy whirlwind in an area within Close range. All targets in this area must make an Agility Reaction Roll. Targets who fail take 4d6+5 magic damage and are Restrained by ice until they break free with a successful Strength Roll. Targets who succeed must mark 2 Stress or take half damage.

features.name: Avalanche
features.description: Spend a Fear to have the Dragon unleash a huge downfall of snow and ice, covering all other creatures within Far range. All targets within this area must succeed on an Instinct Reaction Roll or be buried in snow and rocks, becoming Vulnerable until they dig themselves out from the debris. For each PC that fails the reaction roll, you gain a Fear.

features.name: Frozen Scales
features.description: When a creature makes a successful attack against the Dragon from within Very Close range, they must mark a Stress and become Chilled until their next rest or they clear a Stress. While they are Chilled, they have disadvantage on attack rolls.

features.name: Momentum
features.description: When the Dragon makes a successful attack against a PC, you gain a Fear.

zombie legion.name: Zombie Legion
zombie legion.appearance: *A large pack of undead, still powerful despite their rotting flesh.*

features.name: Horde (2d6+5)
features.description: When Legion has half or more HP marked, standard attack deals 2d6+5 physical damage instead.

features.name: Unyielding
features.description: Legion has resistance to physical damage.

features.name: Relentless (2)
features.description: Legion can be spotlighted up to two times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight.

features.name: Overwhelm
features.description: When Legion takes Minor damage from attack within Melee, mark a Stress to make standard attack with advantage against the attacker.

zombie pack.name: Zombie Pack
zombie pack.appearance: *A group of shambling corpses instinctively moving together.*

features.name: Horde (1d4+2)
features.description: When the Zombies have marked half or more of their HP, their standard attack deals 1d4+2 physical damage instead.

features.name: Overwhelm
features.description: When the Zombies mark HP from an attack within Melee range, you can mark a Stress to make a standard attack against the attacker.
